summary.para: Retrieves an object that represents the related property.

param.name: pszRelationshipName
param.para: A pointer to a string that contains the relationship of the property to get.

param.name: riid
param.para: A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through the ppv parameter, typically IID_IPropertyDescription.

param.name: ppv
param.para: Receives the interface pointer requested in the parameter. This is typically .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: We recommend that you use the macro, defined in Objbase.h, to package the riid and ppv parameters. This macro provides the correct IID based on the interface pointed to by the value in ppv, which eliminates the possibility of a coding error in riid that could lead to unexpected results.

summary.para: Provides a method that retrieves an interface.

remarks.para: Do not implement this interface. There is only one implementation of in the system; it is provided by the Shell.
Only one property description exists for each property in the system.
